entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to freezing rain later this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
